message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $160?
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. I can do $165, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. What do you think?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $160 for the product. This still allows me to stay within my budget while showing appreciation for the value of the item.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway on the price. How about $162.50?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your price. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with a price of $160 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise for both of us.
